elements.name: to == teamAddress || msg.sender == teamAddress || balances[to] * 100 < balances[msg.sender]

detectors.description:
Evrika.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Evrika.sol#42-56) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- to == teamAddress || msg.sender == teamAddress || balances[to] * 100 < balances[msg.sender] (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Evrika.sol#43)
	- balances[msg.sender] -= value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Evrika.sol#46)
	- balances[to] += value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Evrika.sol#47)
detectors.markdown:
[Evrika.transfer(address,uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Evrika.sol#L42-L56) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- [to == teamAddress || msg.sender == teamAddress || balances[to] * 100 < balances[msg.sender]](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Evrika.sol#L43)
	- [balances[msg.sender] -= value](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Evrika.sol#L46)
	- [balances[to] += value](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Evrika.sol#L47)

elements.name: to == teamAddress || from == teamAddress || balances[to] * 100 < balances[from]

detectors.description:
Evrika.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Evrika.sol#58-72) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- to == teamAddress || from == teamAddress || balances[to] * 100 < balances[from] (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Evrika.sol#59)
	- balances[to] += value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Evrika.sol#61)
	- balances[from] -= value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Evrika.sol#62)
	- allowed[from][msg.sender] -= value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Evrika.sol#63)
detectors.markdown:
[Evrika.transferFrom(address,address,uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Evrika.sol#L58-L72) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:

	- [balances[to] += value](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Evrika.sol#L61)
	- [balances[from] -= value](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Evrika.sol#L62)
	- [allowed[from][msg.sender] -= value](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Evrika.sol#L63)

detectors.description:
totalSupply() should be declared external:
	- ERC20.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Evrika.sol#4)
	- Evrika.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Evrika.sol#28-30)

balanceOf(address) should be declared external:
	- ERC20.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Evrika.sol#6)
	- Evrika.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Evrika.sol#34-36)

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:
	- Evrika.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Evrika.sol#38-40)
	- ERC20.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Evrika.sol#8)

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- ERC20.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Evrika.sol#12)
	- Evrika.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Evrika.sol#74-78)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- ERC20.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Evrika.sol#14)
	- Evrika.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Evrika.sol#42-56)
